author: mkwan
msg: 2. Change the way to handle processing instructions in SAX2DTM2. Do not
create extended types for PIs. The name of a PI is saved in the DTMStringPool.
Need to make changes in getLocalName(), getNodeNameX() and getNodeName() to
accommadate this change. This change itself has no performance impact, but it
3. In TypedChildrenIterator.next(), add a conditional block for nodeType == DTM.ELEMENT_NODE.
Because a child of an element can only be an element, text, comment or PI node, and only
an element node has an exptype >= DTM.NTYPES (make use of the changes in 2), we can
eliminate the type check when matching child:*.
4. In TypedDescendantIterator.next(), add a conditional block for the case where
the _startNode is the root node. In this case there is no need to do the isDescendant()
check, because all nodes are descendants of the root.
